name: Medline Digital Wrist Blood Pressure Monitor, Wearable, Digital LCD Display, Stores Up To 60 Readings, Batteries Included
short_description: FITS ON WRIST: Adjustable Velcro strap fits comfortably on wrist for convenient use and ease of portability; automatically inflates and deflates for ease of use
TRACK YOUR HEALTH AT HOME: Monitor your health with easy, accurate blood pressure and pulse rate testing designed for professional results without an office visit
CLINICAL ACCURACY: Large digital readings of systolic/diastolic blood pressure and pulse rate; display indicates if error is detected to ensure reliable results
STORES UP TO 60 MEASUREMENTS: Track historical blood pressure and long-term health

product_description: Product Description For individuals who want to take charge of their own health, experience the precision and convenience of the Medline Digital Wrist Automatic Blood Pressure Monitor for home use. This easy-to-use, one-button start device is intended to measure the systolic and diastolic blood pressures and pulse rate of an adult individual. Monitor comfortably fits on the wrist for convenience and easily goes wherever you go. Designed for speed and ease of use with a wrist cuff that fits most adult individuals (13.5-21.4 cm, 5.3”-8.4”), the monitor provides fast results with minimal discomfort. The monitor also features a large easy-to-read LCD screen with a comparative scale to compare your results to optimal readings. With memory capacity for up to 60 measurements, you can easily track your health progress over time. This monitor meets the Validated Device Listing (VDL) criteria (as listed on validatebp.org) for validation of clinical accuracy, based on the independent review and acceptance of documentation submitted by the manufacturer. Manufacturer Contact Information 1-800-MEDLINE

name: Blood Pressure Monitor with 2x199 Sets Memory, Medisana Automatic Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor for Home Use, 4.5" Color LED Backlit Display, Adjustable Large Cuff, Home Hypertension Detector
short_description: Accurate and Efficient Pressure Measurement：Medisana blood pressure monitor for home use has high-precision sensors and the latest chips. More than 100,000 data points are collected for reliability testing to ensure accurate measurements. Blood pressure is calculated synchronously when the cuff is deflated, and the results are output within dozens of seconds. The WHO 3-color warning light can be used to intuitively judge the health status (low/normal/mild/high risk)

Dual User Intelligent Management：The blood pressure machine allows the whole family to share it, supports 2 user modes and 1 guest mode, and can store up to 398 readings (199 sets of memory values ​​each) with date and time, making it easy to track, compare, and analyze long-term health trends. It is an ideal choice for families with diverse health needs to easily manage and monitor the blood pressure and health of their family members

4.5-inch Color Backlit Display：Equipped with a customized ultra-large high-definition backlit LED color display and a 3-color indicator with WHO classification bar, the ultra-large font displays systolic/diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate, and other important indicators, making it easy for the elderly to use. The exclusive black backlight design is visible at night and can be measured while lying down. The blood pressure monitor with 30° tilt design ensures that users can read easily

Humanized Dual Power Supply Design：The blood pressure monitor supports 4 AAA batteries (included) and a DC 5V Type-C power cable (not included). You can measure your blood pressure right after receiving the product. It is equipped with a 22-42cm (9-17 inch) adjustable cuff to ensure that every measurement is comfortable. The 221g lightweight body and portable carrying bag make it easy to track the health of you and your family, whether you are at home, traveling, or working

One-Button Control for Family Health Monitoring： The Medisana blood pressure monitor can easily start measuring blood pressure and pulse with just one click of Start. Press the MEU button to track blood pressure data to view the history. It captures body movements and prompts you with the correct test posture. It can also automatically detect irregular heartbeats and prompt you on the display. If there is any discomfort, press the Stop button in time to stop the measurement immediately

short_description: Accurate & Fast Readings - Utilizing advanced oscillometric technology, the AQESO blood pressure monitor delivers precise and consistent results. Its easy-to-read WHO classification bar lets you understand your health readings with greater confidence.

3 Size Cuffs for All Arms - The package includes 3 adjustable cuffs that fit arm sizes from 7 to 21 inches, making it suitable for a wide range of users. The cuffs are ergonomically designed to ensure precision and comfort during every measurement.

Ease of Use & Readability - With its large, backlit LCD display, this BP monitor provides clear, oversized readings. The display is designed for easy visibility in low-light conditions, especially useful for elderly users. One-touch operation automatically measures your systolic and diastolic blood pressure.

3-User Support & Memory Storage: This monitor supports up to 3 users, each with the ability to store 500 sets of readings. With the simple push of a button, users can easily recall past measurements, making it easy for families to track their health over time.

Portable & Convenient - Designed for home use and travel, the AQESO blood pressure monitor comes with everything you need for quick setup. The kit includes a BP machine, small, medium/large, and XL cuffs, a USB Type-C cable, 4 AAA batteries, and a user manual. It offers dual power supply options, so you can use AAA batteries or connect via the USB Type-C cable for added convenience.

Please note that the blood pressure device is not rechargeable and requires a continuous power connection when using USB. For the best performance, use the included USB Type-C cable to ensure compatibility.
